devdoc.author: Bird Money
devdoc.details: Admin can add a new Pool, users can deposit pool tokens, harvestReward, withdraw pool tokens

Deposit(address,uint256,uint256).details: when some one deposits pool tokens to contract

EmergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,uint25.details: when some one do EMERGENCY withdraw of pool tokens from contract

Harvest(address,uint256,uint256).details: when some one harvests reward tokens from contract

Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256).details: when some one withdraws pool tokens from contract

params._allocPoint: The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.
params._poolToken: The Liquidity Pool Token of this pool
params._withUpdate: if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked

addRewardTokensToContract(uint256).details: owner can add reward token to contract so that it can be distributed to users

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: deposit pool tokens to BirdFarm for reward tokens allocation.

params._amount: how many tokens you want to stake

harvest(uint256).details: harvest reward tokens from BidFarm and update pool variables

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingRewardToken(uint256,address).details: calculates reward tokens of a user with repect to pool id

params._user: the user who is calls this function

returns._0: pending reward token of a user

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool).details: it can change alloc point (weight of pool) with repect to other pools

params._allocPoint: The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.
params._withUpdate: if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked

setEndRewardBlock(uint256).details: owner can set end reward block

params._endBlock: the block at which reward token distribution ends

setRewardFrozenTime(uint256).details: owner can set reward frozen time

params._usersCanHarvestAtTime: the block at which user can harvest reward

params._rewardToken: the token in which rewards are given

setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256).details: owner can set reward token per block

params._rewardPerBlock: rewards distributed per block to community or users

setStartRewardBlock(uint256).details: owner can set start reward block

params._startBlock: the block at which reward token distribution starts

setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256).details: owner can set unstake frozen time

params._usersCanUnstakeAtTime: the block at which user can unstake

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: withdraw or unstake pool tokens from BidFarm

params._amount: how many pool tokens you want to unstake

bonusEndBlock.details: Block number when bonus REWARD_TOKEN period ends.

endBlock.details: The block number when REWARD_TOKEN mining ends.

rewardPerBlock.details: its equal to approx 1000 reward tokens per day

startBlock.details: The block number when REWARD_TOKEN mining starts.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation poitns. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

userInfo.details: Info of each user that stakes pool tokens.

usersCanHarvestAtTime.details: No reward froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community.

usersCanUnstakeAtTime.details: No unstake froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community.

devdoc.title: Farming service for pool tokens

add(uint256,address,bool).notice: This adds a new pool. Can only be called by the owner.

addRewardTokensToContract(uint256).notice: owner puts reward tokens in contract

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

pendingRewardToken(uint256,address).notice: get reward tokens to show on UI

setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Update the given pool's REWARD_TOKEN pool weight. Can only be called by the owner.

setEndRewardBlock(uint256).notice: owner can change end reward block

setRewardFrozenTime(uint256).notice: owner can change reward frozen time

setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256).notice: owner can change reward token per block

setStartRewardBlock(uint256).notice: owner can change start reward block

setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256).notice: owner can change unstake frozen time

usersCanUnstakeAtTime().notice: user can get reward and unstake after this time only.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: get the tokens back from BardFarm

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to deposit pool tokens and get rewards
